nodes.text: Suliana was an Agriworld in the Senex sector where fields of virgin cotton grew.

Year round, planet wide warmth provided by it rotation speed and distance from its large sun (Type-F star) gave the planet Suliana very optimal conditions for the farming of its virgin cotton. Its produce was famed throughout the sector, and its position on the junction of five sub hyperlane routes made the planet even more successful.[source?]
The planet remained the possession of House Hax; however, it was also home to many from houses Petro and Picutorion.[source?]
